channel.title: Comments on: Old Jews Listening To Jokes

item.title: By: Anonymous
item.dc:creator: Anonymous
item.description:
<strong>Old Jews...</strong><br />Hi,
I'm truly pleased that my site inspired you to record your grandparents responding to a few old chestnuts. It's a delight to watch and although mine are not still around, it gives me a fairly good idea of how they probably would have responded.
Maybe, when we come shoot in LA, you'd like to have them tell a joke for our cameras?
best Sam Hoffman oldjewstellingjokes.com
item.content:encoded:
Old Jews…
Hi,

I’m truly pleased that my site inspired you to record your grandparents responding to a few old chestnuts. It’s a delight to watch and although mine are not still around, it gives me a fairly good idea of how they probably would have responded.

Maybe, when we come shoot in LA, you’d like to have them tell a joke for our cameras?

best
Sam Hoffman
oldjewstellingjokes.com
